topic: How to Automate Actions at The Design Space

definition.text: You can also utilize other functions located within the Function Libraries to help build your Action Function. In order to do this, you just need to locate the instance of the Function Library Object and call any of it's functions.

paragraphs.text: It is a very good idea to invest some time at the Function-Libraries folder, scaning the files in there to see what you already have available to use at your actions. You will see that other actions in Function Libraries heavily rely on functions defined at one of the files within the Function-Libraries folder.
